chapters.title: Chapter 36: Among the Elders
chapters.info: Marisa Ayellin, p. 518—Girl from Emond's Field who thinks Mat Cauthon is handsome. Perrin says that Marisa has a face like a goat, but this was just to spite Mat. She is actually about as pretty as Egwene, according to Rand. See also Ayellin, Neysa.
